thread.title: #Facts that #Mastodon users always refuse to accept, yet these are true:... - Firefox - Fedia
thread.title_full: #Facts that #Mastodon users always refuse to accept, yet these are true:... - Firefox - Fedia

title: #Facts that #Mastodon users always refuse to accept, yet these are true:... - Firefox - Fedia
text:
[ExpertPlus],
[#Facts]that[#Mastodon]users always refuse to accept, yet these are true:
[#Brave]is the best browser and a search engine. No else[#browser]is better then it. No else search engine. Not even[#Firefox]or[#Chrome].
[#iPhone]are the best phones with their iOS to exist. And no, Android devices aren't better.
[#Bluesky]is the best alternative to[#ATProtocol]) alternative that we all need.
[#ZCash]is a better[#privacy]focused[#cryptocurrency]then[#Monero].From my interactions with Mastodon users, all of these facts aren't accepted by them at all, they really start to strongly defend their beliefs, starting to talking about either reputation or behavement of a person/company, or either their past actions. Guess what? I don't care about anything of that; I just need a good product that worth to use.
I'll add more to that list, if I'll think of any.
[BeAware],
[@ExpertPlus]Bluesky is[https://bsky.app]You're posting anti-fediverse crap on the Fediverse, probably won't go over very well.
Opinions aren't facts.
[ExpertPlus]OP ,
[@BeAware]edited the post :-)What do you mean by "Bluesky is bsky.app"?
And while stating all of these as facts is extreme, I agree, I just said all because of my own experience, I tried it all myself before stating any.
[BeAware],
[@ExpertPlus]I mean that you probably should have posted your BlueSky propaganda on BlueSky itself.ü§∑‚ôÇÔ∏èWould probably be seen in a better light there.
[ExpertPlus]OP ,
[@BeAware]hmmm.........probably you're right.
[kbal],Why are you shilling for like six different things at once? You'll never make a living at it that way.
[ExpertPlus]OP ,
[@kbal]Good question.....I just shared statistics. It's like a "Did You Know?" type of post.
